arguments.value: question must not be pending arbitration
finalization deadline must not have passed
finalization dealine must not have passed
bond must be double at least previous bond
timeout must be less than 365 days
ETH provided must cover question fee
commitment must not have been revealed yet
reveal deadline must not have passed
Question must already have an answer when arbitration is requested
at least one history hash entry must be provided
History input provided did not match the expected hash
The arbitrator must have set a non-zero fee for the question
The question must not have been finalized
